NSPathControl(NDAlias)

Additional meethods of NSPathControl to deal with NDAlias instances.

Extends Class: NSPathControl
Author:

Sean McBride @date Saturday, 16 August 2007
Declared In: NSPathControl+NDAlias.h

Discussion

Adds three methods to NSPathControl


Methods

-alias

Returns the path value displayed by the receiver as an alias.

-path

Returns the path value displayed by the receiver.

-setAlias:

Sets the path value displayed by the receiver.

alias

Returns the path value displayed by the receiver as an alias.

Author:

Sean McBride @date Saturday, 16 August 2007

- (NDAlias*)alias;
Return Value

A NDAlias.

Discussion

alias is equivelent to -[NSPathControl URL] but returning a NDAlias

path

Returns the path value displayed by the receiver.

Author:

Sean McBride @date Saturday, 16 August 2007

- (NSString*)path;
Return Value

A POSIX path.

Discussion

path is equivelent to -[NSPathControl URL] but returning a POSIX path NSString

setAlias:

Sets the path value displayed by the receiver.

Author:

Sean McBride @date Saturday, 16 August 2007

- (void)setAlias:(NDAlias*)alias;
Parameters
alias
